name: Pipe Dream (itch) (technodragon253)
description: This game was made in 100 hours for the extra credit's game jam. Use number button 1 -  4 to change pipe color (1-blue, 2-red, 3-green, 4-clear/mixer pipe) . Left click to place a pipe. Right click to break a pipe. Try to get the correct colors in to the arrows going out. Red + Blue = Magenta, Red + Green = Yellow,  Blue + Green = Cyan, Red + Green + Blue = White
